name: @objectql/cli
description: Command-line interface for ObjectQL - metadata scaffolding, type generation, DB workflows, and local tooling

scripts.copy-templates: rm -rf templates && mkdir -p templates && rsync -av --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='dist' --exclude='__tests__' ../../../examples/quickstart/hello-world templates/ && rsync -av --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='dist' --exclude='__tests__' ../../../examples/showcase/project-tracker/ templates/starter
